g32706-d249597.name_hotel: Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area
g32706-d249597.description: Welcome to the NEW Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area, Located off Highway 99 and the Ideal stopover on your way to Yosemite National Park. We are also convenient for families visiting UC Merced and the Dignity Healthcare Facility. If you are looking for pet-friendly Merced hotels as well as convenience to local attractions, reserve your room with us today. Wake up with the comfort of our Free Full Hot American Breakfast Buffet including pancakes, biscuits, sausages and much more. Travel with ease thanks to our free parking, with space for large vehicles including trucks and RVs. When you are ready to get comfortable, settle into our brand new guest rooms with free high-speed WiFi, microwave, mini fridge, 55-inch LED TV, desk, as well as coffee and tea facilities. Make us your choice of hotels in Merced, California today and request a Yosemite Informational Guide to prepare for your breathtaking adventure!

N-11-2020-CaliTravelerA.review_title: Just a rest for a night
N-11-2020-CaliTravelerA.review_text: Traveling with my family and knew we would need a room to take a rest for the night. The room was clean, the fridge worked great for storing our trip food and baby formula, it was quiet, and we all slept well. I'd definitely stay again.

Y-03-2020-Toonert.review_title: Stopped here on way to Angel's Camp
Y-03-2020-Toonert.review_text:
Very nice, clean property, right across alley from Denny's.   Staff were very friendly.  Breakfast had several choices, and perfect for moving on down the road the next day.
My room was very comfortable.  The TV was a nice size.   And property was quiet for a good rest.  Unfortunately, no pictures of property.
Y-03-2020-Toonert.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time share your experience with us at the Days Inn Yosemite Area Merced. It's always a pleasure to hear our guests so thoroughly enjoyed their stay. We're looking forward to your next stay again!
Y-03-2020-Toonert.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

N-11-2020-kristinalN7860GM.review_text: If your looking for a good priced place to stay — THIS IS IT. Amazing Staff, Clean Rooms, & UPDATED! Definitely worth your night if you can’t decide which place to stay at.!!! Can’t wait to come back when things open back up

Y-11-2020-amanda11494.review_text: The room was so clean and impressive! For the price that it was, we were blown away! My husband and I checked in the night of 11/14/2020 and the staff was SO nice and friendly. We spent the day at Yosemite (only an hour and a half away from the hotel, another park!) and the check-in process took minutes and then we went out to eat at a diner that was only four minutes away! We got back to the hotel and immediately fell asleep after showering, the king size bed was SO comfy. We mentioned it was our honeymoon (one day honeymoon, my husband is military and had to get back to work) and they wrote us the SWEETEST note and had a little heart of towels on the bed. We are already planning when we can come back and already said we will stay here when we do! I absolutely recommend this place.
Y-11-2020-amanda11494.review_response:
Dear Guest,
We are so excited that you enjoyed your stay! Our staff was very eager for your arrival, as they were planning your stay since they found out you were coming. We appreciate the feedback and cannot wait for your next stay. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you or any other feedback you would like us to know.
Y-11-2020-amanda11494.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-11-2020-alexis_christina.review_text: We stayed here on our way to Yosemite which was about 2.5 hours away. This Days Inn looks like a standard roadside motel from the outside but the rooms, though small, had been remodeled and we’re nice and clean. We were pleasantly surprised by how nice it was.
Y-11-2020-alexis_christina.review_response: Thank you for choosing to stay at Days Inn Yosemite Area Merced. We appreciate your kind review and we hope to see you again the next time your visiting the area.
Y-11-2020-alexis_christina.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-09-2020-CHRISL525.review_text:
this hotel was just remodeled a year or so back, so it looks great and feels clean! great beds, t.v. with cable, mini frig, very clean.
hotel has one of the nices staff out there, the front desk staff is 5 stars.
the area around the hotel is not great, but the hotel keeps there area clean and problem free. fast food next door, shopping 4 blocks away, close to amtrak and greyhound and near freeway.
Y-09-2020-CHRISL525.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for the wonderful review and for choosing to spend your time in the area with us. We appriciate your kind words and we can wait to welcome you back the next time you are in the area. Again, thank you we wish you the best in your future travels.
Y-09-2020-CHRISL525.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-09-2020-601sharynm.review_text:
Stayed here unexpectedly as couldn’t make it in time to our booked accommodation.
The room itself was very clean as was the bathroom. They both looked like they had been recently renovated.
The motel style setup was not really my style as, to me, it seemed like there may have been someone ‘living’ in there next room.
Breakfast was included but I didn’t check it out, as I had to leave early.
Ok for a short stay.
Y-09-2020-601sharynm.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your time and feedback. We appreciate your kind words and it makes us really happy to hear that you injoyed your stay with us. Hope to see you again the next time you are in the area. And again, thank you for your time and feedback we wish you the best in your future travels.
Y-09-2020-601sharynm.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-08-2020-sylviasantos82104.review_text: My room was very nice.  It was clean and smelled fresh.  The air conditioner was not too loud and worked well.  Amenities included a mini fridge, a microwave and a Keurig coffee machine.  The bath towels were bright white and plush.
Y-08-2020-sylviasantos82104.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for your wounderful review. We are very happy to hear that you were happy wiht your stay. We cant wait to welcome you back the next time you are in the area with us. Hope to see you again and we wish you the best in your future travels.
Y-08-2020-sylviasantos82104.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-08-2020-27kathiek.review_text: Cockroaches were walking freely in the room when we walked in.  Was able to kill two. Hair in the bathroom on the floor and wall.  Had driven 15 hrs with a broken foot in a boot.  Was tired and in pain. Slept with the lights on, with masks over our eyes, hoping to keep the bugs away.  Not very secure area. Sketchy men walking around at night. Was given 15% discount (I haven't seen yet) for my "inconvenience" for the cockroaches and dirty room.    Did have GREAT beds though.
Y-08-2020-27kathiek.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We appreciate your feedback. We are deeply sorry and apologize that you were not entirely comfortable during your stay. And yes, you should soon recieve the discount you were promised if you have not recieved it yet.  Again, thank you for your feedback we wish you the best in your future travels.
Y-08-2020-27kathiek.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-08-2020-832erica.review_text: Room was beautiful. But we wondered why they only leave a very small hook for towels instead of a towel bar. Neighborhood was noisy outside until about 11:00pm. That is my only complaint. Front desk clerk was very pleasant.
Y-08-2020-832erica.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for you kind words we appreciate your time. We understand it can get a little noisy due to highway 99 being next to us but we are pleased you were happy with our clerk at the front desk. Again, we appreciate your time and wish you the best in your future travels.
Y-08-2020-832erica.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-07-2020-kelleej111.review_text: Clean. Sad no breakfast because of covid. Should put more coffees in the rooms to make up for it. Great cable channels. Its mostly because of covid19 that staff interactions in general feel weird these days, but everything was great and met my expectaions otherwise.
Y-07-2020-kelleej111.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for letting others know about your experience at our hotel.  We'll take your suggestion about the k-cups to our housekeeping staff. We appreciate the tip, and also your understanding of how the pandemic has affected normal businesses like our own. We're looking forward to where we can welcome you back with our full hot breakfast!
Y-07-2020-kelleej111.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-06-2020-David874T.review_text: Very comfortable bed which was a nice welcome after a 400 mile drive.  Room was spotless.  Staff is very friendly.  The only down would be that we probably got maybe 5 channels on the tv.  Every other channel required a pin that I didn't know and didn't want to bother asking.  The neighborhood wasn't the best but me, my wife, and my daughter all felt safe.  I would stay here again.
Y-06-2020-David874T.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for your kind words, we'll be sure to let the housekeeping staff know how much you appreciated our cleanliness. Pleas don't ever feel like you'd be a bother, we're constantly striving to deliver the best stay possible for you, and that includes our tv channels! We look forward to seeing you again, and we'll be sure to have you tv all set for your families arrival. Cheers to your safe and healthy travels.
Y-06-2020-David874T.review_responder: Response from Days  Inn, Guest Services / Front Office at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-03-2020-H7724VDgabrielag.review_text: This was an amazing experience. Danielle the receptionist made me feel comfortable to stay in this hotel itself because she was kind, she had the greatest smile when you walk into the office. And she was so nice.
Y-03-2020-H7724VDgabrielag.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We're thrilled to hear that you had an excellent stay with us. Danielle, we agree, is wonderful and always has a smile ready for all our guests. We look forward to your next stay, and wish you happy travels until then!
Y-03-2020-H7724VDgabrielag.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-03-2020-earboleda.review_text: We enjoyed our stay at this property.  The staff was very friendly and professional.  Hotel was very clean and the beds were comfortable.  It was on an ideal location close to the freeway. The breakfast was adequate given the price of the room.
Y-03-2020-earboleda.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thanks for letting us know about your stay!
We love hearing you found the location to be so ideal, and have forwarded your compliments to our staff. Your kind words are always appreciated, and we hope to see you again the next time you're in our area!
Y-03-2020-earboleda.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-03-2020-c47roost.review_text: Never staying here again.  I understand they can't control everyone that stays there but they should take care of others that are disrupted.  Standing behind policies when things go wrong is understandable but sometimes you have to be able to recognize when things have gone too far.
Y-03-2020-c47roost.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We're dismayed to hear that your stay missed the mark. We always strive to deliver an excellent experience for our guest, and would love the opportunity to turn your experience with us around. We know that we would be able to earn your confidence in us if given the chance. We do hope you'll stay with us again, and have happy travels until then.
Y-03-2020-c47roost.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-03-2020-LS470.review_text: Rough area, security lacking, small room, bare bones.  Lots of homeless hanging around gas station next door & across the street.  Trip advisor ratings are very misleading - nowhere near 3rd best out of 15 motels in Merced!
Y-03-2020-LS470.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We're very glad you decided to stay with us at the Days Inn Yosemimte Area Merced. While we cannot change our location, we do believe that our rooms provide excellent value! We'd love for you to stay with us again, so that we can earn your confidence isn what many others see when it comes to us,  being a great hotel!
Y-03-2020-LS470.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-03-2020-Obanone.review_text: Location not the greatest.  Staff did not recommend walking to any of the nearby restaurants.  The deposit for our one night stay was unlike any we have experienced - $100 cash returnable upon departure or $50 on credit card that would be returned after 5 days.  Unlikely that we will use a Days Inn in the future.
Y-03-2020-Obanone.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We do have a deposit policy, and also allow our guests to pay in cash if they choose to. Your deposit is returned on the day of your departure, though it generally can take up to 3-5 business days for your own financial institution to make those monies available to you again.
Y-03-2020-Obanone.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-02-2020-Saimonmm2020.review_title: One of the best Days Inns to stay.
Y-02-2020-Saimonmm2020.review_text:
New building, very clean, and WiFi is very good. The only thing I want to say that the water come out from shower is not strong enough like other Inns and the rooms are a little small, but I'm OK with that. Over all is awesome. 
I would recommend to you to stay there.
Y-02-2020-Saimonmm2020.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience with us. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.
Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.
Y-02-2020-Saimonmm2020.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-01-2020-jonesk535.review_text: My room was clean, kind of quiet considering how close hwy 99 is to the hotel. Some questionable people across the street but not the hotel's doing. Breakfast was decent and coffee hot. The hotel was very bust but staff replaced food as needed.
Y-01-2020-jonesk535.review_response: Dear Valued Guest, Thank you for sharing your stay with us! We're glad you tried our complimentary breakfast. Our staff is always striving to make sure our guests have an excellent stay, and we hope to see you again the next time you're in the neighborhood!
Y-01-2020-jonesk535.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-01-2020-Cadillacmama88.review_text: Front desk clerk Juliana was so helpful and made it real easy to fix reservations from 2 nights to 1. We were in town from my sons Great Grandmother’s funeral services. The room was clean and nicely updated.
Y-01-2020-Cadillacmama88.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
We do hope that while the circumstances were quite somber for your visit, that we were able to make things less stresful for you and your family in your difficult time. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us, we would gladly welcome you back the next time you were in the area.
Y-01-2020-Cadillacmama88.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-12-2019-geewiz111.review_text: The hotel was recently renovated. The lobby and rooms were beautiful.  The room was comfortable, big flat screen, and the heating/cooling worked perfectly.  The shower was beautiful. The staff was really nice and helpful
Y-12-2019-geewiz111.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
Thank you for taking the time to leave such a lovely review! Our housekeeping and front desk always strives to deliver an excellent stay for our guests, and we're thrilled to hear you felt that we delivered! We wish you safe and happy travels in the future, and look forward to your next stay.
Y-12-2019-geewiz111.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-12-2019-Quest227354.review_text: Nice clean room, with a relatively elegant modern updated look. Rooms are very small, but this is more than made up for in the non-retro, non-dingy, functional simplicity of the room and the bedding. Has all the expected appointments, and they work well.
Y-12-2019-Quest227354.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest,
Thank you for letting us know about your stay, we love receiving compliments on our rooms! We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a review, and look forward to your next stay!
Y-12-2019-Quest227354.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-12-2019-MariposaGirl.review_text: I picked this motel based on reviews, proximity to the Amtrak Merced station and nearness of food choices.  Being a solo female traveler, safety and convenience are so important.  I came in at night and had a bit of trouble finding the place because the motel SIGN was NOT lit up but my gps got me there.  There’s a busy Denny’s actually IN the same corner lot, you can walk right over without even crossing a street. I felt safe during the short walk in the dark.  Only saw a Denny’s employee taking a break, no homeless people mentioned in other reviews.  Lobby is bright and clean, sweet desk clerk girl very friendly and bright as well!  Room small but clean as a pin.  Well appointed, even a microwave which is often missing in these chain motels.  I’ll definitely stay here again as needed to make travel convenient using Amtrak.
Y-12-2019-MariposaGirl.review_response:
Daer Valued Guest, 
Thanks for leaving us such a thorough review, we appreciate your kind words, and are glad our staff left such a great impression on you! We would love to have you stay with us again the next time you're visiting our area, and look forward to seeing you soon!
Y-12-2019-MariposaGirl.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-12-2019-569elaine.review_text: Immaculately clean room with a very comfortable plush top mattress. Generously sized towels, a small fridge and micro rounded out a simple, but very comfortable room. Nice breakfast with hot and cold items.  I especially liked the automatic pancake machine & Greek yogurt dispenser! For the price I sincerely doubt anyone could do better!  (I return to the Merced area regularly and will make this Days Inn my first choice from now on.)
Y-12-2019-569elaine.review_response:
Dear Valued Guest, 
What a great thing to hear, we would love to be your first choice from now on! We love our automatic pancake machine and yogurt dispenser, and are glad you did as well. Cheers to your return, we're looking forward to seeing you again.
Y-12-2019-569elaine.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area

Y-12-2019-mariapartika.review_text:
Merced is a small town without the big city lights. If your looking for grandeur you won’t find it here. But what you will find is is a clean, respectable and an affordable room close to everything with a wonderful staff.
Sincerely,
Maria
Y-12-2019-mariapartika.review_response:
Dear Maria, 
Thank you for the review, we hope you enjoyed your stay, and are happy to hear you found your room to be clean, and your stay affordable. We wish you safe and happy travels, and look forward to seeing you again the next time you're in our area.
Y-12-2019-mariapartika.review_responder: Response from Daysmanager1, Manager at Days Inn by Wyndham Merced/Yosemite Area
